articles.title: Test Driving The 2025 Porsche 911 GTS T-Hybrid
articles.author: Forbes
articles.summary: The 911 GTS T-Hybrid operates as a practical vehicle for daily commuting. It transforms into a high-performance racing car with the push of a button, offering versatility.

articles.title: Nectar Mattress Sale: Shop Editor-Tested Beds At Up To 62% Off
articles.summary: Nectar is holding a Summer Spectacular event offering discounts of up to 62% on mattresses and bundles. The sale includes significant savings on their sleep editors' favorite beds.

articles.title: Top-rated Dyson hair dryer lookalike slashed in price to $79 at Amazon Australia
articles.author: Best Picks Team
articles.summary: Dreame has launched the Dreame Hair Gleam Hair Dryer, a lightweight and efficient hair dryer featuring intelligent temperature control and negative ionic technology to reduce frizz and maintain hair health. The Dreame Hair Gleam Hair Dryer, currently on sale for $79, offers customizable temperature and airflow settings.

articles.title: TOYCITY Launches Xiao Pa AI: First Interactive Plush Companion Based on Beloved 'Mr. Pa' IP
articles.author: Newsfile
articles.summary: TOYCITY launched Xiao Pa AI, an intelligent plush doll based on their Mr. Pa panda IP, in Shanghai. This interactive AI companion combines trendy collectibles with cutting-edge artificial intelligence, offering a new way to connect with smart technology.

articles.title: Costway's portable washing machine is on sale for over 30% off at Walmart
articles.author: Danielle Halibey
articles.summary: Costway has launched the 26 lbs. Portable Semi-Automatic Washing Machine, available at Walmart for $210 after a $109 discount. The machine is designed as a space-saving solution for small apartments, dorms, RVs, and homes without washer-dryer hookups, featuring a built-in drain pump and a user-friendly control panel. The portable washing machine has 18 lbs. of laundry in the wash tub and 8 lbs. in the spin tub and comes in Blue and Gray colorways.

articles.title: Everything You Need To Know About The 2025 Lexus GX
articles.summary: Lexus is debuting the 2024 GX, featuring an all-new boxy body style. The new Lexus GX is designed with impressive on- and off-road capabilities.

articles.title: Nike's new women's Astra Ultra sneaker blends AI design with soccer-inspired style
articles.author: Mikhayla Dunaj
articles.summary: Nike is launching the Women's Astra Ultra Burgundy Crush and Metallic Silver sneaker on July 23rd. The new sneaker features a Burgundy Crush upper, Metallic Silver accents, a sleek silhouette inspired by soccer cleats, and was designed using 3D generative AI to enhance comfort and performance. It will be available for $115.

articles.title: 6 Pixel-Exclusive Features You Can Port to Any Android Phone
articles.author: Yadullah Abidi
articles.summary: Pixel-exclusive features such as Google Camera, Now Playing, and Magic Eraser can be obtained on other Android devices by sideloading modified APKs or using alternative apps. While Call Screen is difficult to port, similar functionality can be achieved. Google Recorder and Pixel Launcher can also be installed on non-Pixel devices, though some limitations may apply.

articles.title: Stop Guessing, Start Growing: How the NRS AI Product Recommendations Feature Improves Your Store in 5 Ways
articles.author: Jim Gallentine
articles.summary: National Retail Solutions (NRS) introduces its AI Product Recommendations feature, which analyzes local sales data to provide personalized inventory suggestions for retailers. This feature aims to reduce dead inventory, discover high-profit products, track neighborhood trends, and enable confident ordering decisions, helping independent retailers compete with chain stores.

articles.title: Catch the latest Nintendo Switch 2 bundle dropping this October — here's where to preorder it ASAP
articles.author: Victoria Rosenthal
articles.summary: Nintendo is launching the Nintendo Switch 2 + 'Pokémon Legends: Z-A' Bundle on October 16 for $500, with preorders starting July 23. The bundle includes an improved console and the 'Pokémon Legends: Z-A' game. Standalone physical and digital versions of the game, a digital upgrade pack, and a Nintendo Switch 1 version are also available for preorder.

articles.title: New Mega Pokemon Coming to Pokemon Legends: Z-A
articles.author: Austin Boyd
articles.summary: Nintendo is launching Pokemon Legends: Z-A on October 16, 2025, for the Nintendo Switch 2. Pre-orders are now live, and a new trailer showcasing story details and new features, including a mega version of Dragonair, has been released. A $499.99 Nintendo Switch 2 bundle will include Pokemon Legends: Z-A.

articles.title: What's Your Problem? #8
articles.author: Jeff Clemetson
articles.summary: The article suggests using Generative AI tools such as Midjourney, DALL·E, ChatGPT, Whimsical, and Miro for quickly visualizing and prototyping new product, service, and process ideas. As ideas gain traction, tools like Canva, Figma, Tome, Synthesia, and Runway ML can create higher-fidelity visuals. For real-world testing, platforms like Glide, Bubble, Tally, Notion, and Retool are recommended for building MVPs and simulating customer interactions or internal tools.

articles.title: Pokémon Legends: Z-A Switch 2 bundle announced
articles.author: Victoria Phillips Kennedy
articles.summary: Nintendo will launch a game bundle including the Switch 2 edition of Pokémon Legends: Z-A on October 16th. This bundle, which will feature improved graphics and frame rates, will be available for pre-order starting July 23rd.

articles.title: Pokemon Legend: Z-A Gets New Trailer and Nintendo Switch 2 Bundle
articles.author: This Gen Gaming
articles.summary: The Pokemon Company released a new trailer for Pokemon Legends: Z-A during the Pokemon Presents livestream. The trailer reveals more details about the game's story, characters, and Pokemon.

articles.title: Nvidia Stock Warning: This NVDA Challenger Just Scored a Major Customer
articles.author: Wajeeh Khan
articles.summary: FuriosaAI's 'RNGD' chip will power LG's 'Exaone' large-language models. The RNGD chip delivers 2.25x better performance per watt and offers a lower total cost of ownership compared to conventional graphics processing units.

articles.title: Jennifer Lopez has a message for those wondering if she really uses her skincare line
articles.author: Lisa Respers France
articles.summary: Jennifer Lopez promotes her JLo Beauty skincare line, launched in 2021, addressing customer inquiries about her personal use and the products' effectiveness. She emphasizes the importance of sunscreen, a key component of her skincare routine, and encourages customers to focus on achieving their best selves.

articles.title: Pokemon Z-A release date: Mega Dragonite, pre-order perks, styles, features, side-quests revealed
articles.author: Global Desk
articles.summary: The Pokémon Company is launching Pokémon Legends Z-A on October 16, 2025, for Nintendo Switch and Nintendo Switch 2. The game introduces the new Mega Evolution, Mega Dragonite, and features pre-order bonuses including 100 Poké Balls and a Ralts with Gardevoirite. The game is set in Lumiose City with day/night cycles, where players join Team MZ.

articles.title: Kioxia Unveils Industry's First 245 TB NVMe SSD For AI Workloads
articles.author: BERNAMA
articles.summary: Kioxia Corporation has launched the industry's first 245.76 terabyte NVMe solid-state drive (SSD) as part of its KIOXIA LC9 Series. The new high-capacity model, available in 2.5-inch and EDSFF E3.L form factors, targets demanding generative AI environments.

articles.title: Coca-Cola Co. says it will launch version of its drink with American cane sugar
articles.author: NBC News
articles.summary: Coca-Cola Co. plans to launch a new version of its drink sweetened with American cane sugar. This decision follows President Donald Trump's social media post about a potential offering related to cane sugar. The new product will differ from the current drink made with corn syrup.

articles.title: Shop these backpacks and laptop sleeves to protect your kids' tech this school year
articles.author: Kelsey Legg
articles.summary: Beis offers the Classic Backpack in Burgundy. WAYB features the Daily Backpack. L.L. Bean provides the Original Book Pack, and also the Padded Laptop Sleeve. Pottery Barn Kids sells the Mackenzie Backpack. Lululemon offers the Everywhere Backpack 22L, and Calpak features the Kaya 15 inch Laptop Backpack.

articles.title: TECNO PHANTOM Ultimate G Fold Concept: Meet the Worlds thinnest tri-fold smartphone
articles.author: Premium Times
articles.summary: TECNO is introducing the PHANTOM Ultimate G Fold Concept, a tri-fold smartphone. This device features a dual-screen, inward-folding design and a 9.94-inch display with enhanced durability.

articles.title: Samsung's 2025 Lineup Is Foldable, Smart, and Secure
articles.author: Ryan Hansen
articles.summary: Samsung launched several new products in July 2025, including the Galaxy Z Fold 7 starting at $1,999, the Z Flip 7 with a focus on impact protection and increased battery capacity, the Fan Edition foldable at $899, and new smartwatches starting at $349. These new devices feature advancements in AI integration, camera technology, and overall performance, pushing foldable technology into daily use.

articles.title: People Send ChatGPT 2.5 Billion Prompts a Day. That's Billion, With a B.
articles.author: Matt Jancer
articles.summary: Perplexity AI launched the Comet browser, aiming to challenge Google's Chrome and search dominance. Google is responding with Gemini AI to compete with emerging AI technologies like ChatGPT and Claude, integrating AI summaries into its search results in a limited way.

articles.title: Google Shows Off Pixel 10 Design Ahead Of August 20 Launch Event
articles.author: Chris Smith
articles.summary: Google will unveil the Pixel 10 series on August 20 and is giving a sneak peek of the Pixel 10 Pro model on its online store, highlighting the camera bar and a new color, "Moonstone." Google is also offering an exclusive promotional code for new email subscribers on August 20 for the purchase of the advertised specified Pixel 10 device.

articles.title: Aldi is launching an Olaplex haircare dupe range for £24 cheaper – & it includes a bargain £4.99 moisture mask
articles.author: Becky Pemberton
articles.summary: Aldi is launching the Lacura Bonded Haircare Collection on July 31st, a more affordable alternative to Olaplex products. The collection includes shampoo, conditioner, pre-wash treatment, moisture mask, and purple shampoo, priced between £3.99 and £4.99, and claims to repair and strengthen damaged hair.

articles.title: Aldi is launching an Olaplex haircare dupe range for £24 cheaper – & it includes a bargain £4.99 moisture mask
articles.author: Becky Pemberton
articles.summary: Aldi is launching the Lacura Bonded Haircare Collection on July 31st, featuring affordable alternatives to Olaplex products. The collection includes shampoo, conditioner, a pre-wash hair treatment, a moisture mask, and purple shampoo, with prices ranging from £3.99 to £4.99.

articles.title: Driving impressions: is the Renault Duster 1. 3T 4x2 Zen AT worth your attention?
articles.author: Willem van de Putte
articles.summary: Renault has introduced a revamped Duster SUV with a new design language, petrol and mild-hybrid engine options. The updated Duster includes a redesigned interior, improved ergonomics, a 10.1-inch infotainment system with wireless Apple CarPlay and Android Auto, and enhanced safety features like six airbags and blind spot detection. Pricing starts at R489 999.

articles.title: Roomba Max 705 Combo AI Robot Vacuum Mop Revolution
articles.author: PRN
articles.summary: iRobot introduced the Roomba Max 705 Combo Robot + AutoWash™ Dock, a 2-in-1 vacuum and mop combo with 175x more suction power and AI-driven navigation. The product features a PowerSpin(TM) Roller Mop with PerfectEdge(R) Technology and an AutoWash(TM) Dock, and is available for pre-sale in Europe for €1099.

articles.title: This Disney Princess Dress Generator Is Creating Outfits So Stunning It Has Me Ready To Sell My Soul For My Own Fairy Godmother
articles.author: Taylor Barraclough
articles.summary: Disney introduces the Disney Princess Dress Designer, a new service that allows users to create customized virtual princess dresses inspired by various Disney princesses. Users can design dresses with features like flowing sleeves and starlit motifs, reflecting the style of princesses like Ariel or Belle.

articles.title: The award-winning Maidenhead company 'at the forefront' of AI innovations
articles.author: Sam Leech
articles.summary: RWS' Language Weaver, a Neural Machine Translation AI, won the AI Breakthrough Awards for its ability to translate 500,000 words per minute into 150+ languages. RWS also acquired Papercup, an AI dubbing company specializing in translating audio into multiple languages, enhancing its content solutions.

articles.title: Google Just Gave Us an Official Glimpse of the Pixel 10 Pro
articles.author: Matt Jancer
articles.summary: Google's Pixel 10 Pro is partially revealed ahead of its official August 20, 2025 debut via the Google Store. The design is largely unchanged, featuring the familiar camera bar, and Google is offering an exclusive deal to new email subscribers on launch day.

articles.title: The missing discipline in deep tech: How markets are built before they exist
articles.author: Mae Cornes
articles.summary: Paxos, with Huang's marketing strategies, expanded its partner ecosystem to nearly 100 financial platforms globally, growing USDP's market capitalization significantly. Similarly, Pinecone, using structured use case taxonomy and solution marketing strategy, achieved adoption by over 30,000 enterprise users, and got recognition in Forbes's AI 50.

articles.title: Answer Angel: New Q-tip styles?
articles.author: Ellen Warren
org: Living By The Tribune Content Agency
articles.summary: Q-tip has introduced a new Q-tip with a "Hygiene Shield," coated with an antimicrobial layer. Walgreens is selling a "Cotton Swabs Variety Pack" featuring different types of cotton swabs, including black, flat, and pointy swabs.

articles.title: New Nintendo Switch 2 bundle announced as console breaks another sales record
articles.author: Michael Beckwith
articles.summary: Nintendo will launch a new Nintendo Switch 2 bundle that includes a copy of Pokémon Legends: Z-A, launching on October 16. Pre-orders for the bundle will open on July 23, and the pricing is estimated to be around £454.98.

articles.title: 5 Android Features That Completely Disappeared, And Why
articles.author: Aaron Greenbaum
articles.summary: Android introduced live folders in Android 1.5, later replacing them with widgets in Android 4. NFC-centric system Android Beam was a premier feature for Android 4.0, but Google deprecated it in Android 10. Google removed in-house Miracast functionality with Android 6 in favor of Chromecast, and Google is resurrecting the lock screen widget from Android 4.2 in Android 16.

articles.title: Pokémon Presents July 2025: Everything Announced
articles.author: Adam Bankhurst
articles.summary: The Pokémon Company is launching Pokémon Legends: Z-A on October 16, 2025, for Switch and Switch 2. The game features Mega Evolutions, including Mega Dragonite, and a nighttime Z-A Royale event where players battle trainers.

articles.title: Mega Dragonite debuts in fresh look at Pok�mon Legends: Z-A
articles.author: Eurogamer
articles.summary: The Pokémon Company revealed Mega Dragonite, a new addition to the forthcoming Pokémon Legends Z-A game, during the Pokémon Presents stream.

articles.title: Ricoh InnoAI Center Grand Launch Ushering in a New Era for the AI Ecosystem in Asia  Jul. 22, 2025 15:26
org: Hong Kong Cyberport Management Company Limited
articles.summary: Ricoh launched the upgraded InnoAI Linker in August, enabling document and data transfer from Ricoh AI MFPs to the InnoAI Hub. Ricoh also launched the Ricoh AI Marketplace, allowing InnoAI partners to connect their AI applications directly to Ricoh AI MFPs. Furthermore, Pickso, an InnoAI partner, has launched its "Docufinder" AI solution on the AI Marketplace.

articles.title: KIOXIA Announces Industry's First 245.76 TB NVMe SSD Built for the Demands of Generative AI Environments
articles.author: BERNAMA
articles.summary: Kioxia Corporation has expanded its KIOXIA LC9 Series enterprise SSD lineup by introducing a 245.76 terabyte NVMe SSD in 2.5-inch and EDSFF E3.L form factors. This new SSD is designed for the performance and efficiency demands of generative AI environments, complementing the existing 122.88 TB model.

articles.title: 12New.AI launches AI agent for Autonomous Tender Search
articles.author: info@kalkinemedia.com
articles.summary: TenderAgent.AI scans federal and local procurement portals to deliver relevant tenders to users' inboxes, providing a service that delivers targeted procurement information.

articles.title: Pokémon Legends: Z-A has a detailed new trailer and Switch 2 bundle
articles.author: Ash Parrish
articles.summary: Nintendo is launching a new Nintendo Switch 2 bundle, named Nintendo Switch 2 + Pokémon Legends: Z-A – Nintendo Switch 2 Edition, on October 16th for $499. The Pokemon Legends: Z-A game will be released on both Nintendo Switch systems on October 16th, and features new mega-evolutions such as Mega Dragonite.

articles.title: Pokémon Presents: Key Announcements and Reveals from the Showcase
articles.author: Sophie Lin
articles.summary: The Pokémon Company revealed Pokémon Legends: Z-A, an open-world game set in the Kalos region, slated for a 2025 release on the Nintendo Switch. It also announced updates to the Pokémon Scarlet and Violet DLC (Indigo Disk), new Pokémon Trading Card Game expansions, new sync pairs and events for Pokémon Masters EX, and upcoming events for Pokémon GO and Pokémon UNITE. The showcase highlighted the integration of the Terastal phenomenon into multiple platforms.

articles.title: Pepsi to roll out major soda switch for first time in 20 years – and fans can try two flavors
articles.author: Fabulous Digital Writer
articles.summary: PepsiCo is launching Pepsi Prebiotic Cola, available in Original Cola and Cherry Vanilla flavors, with 5 grams of sugar and 3 grams of prebiotic fiber. Coca-Cola also plans to launch a new version of its iconic drink sweetened with cane sugar in the US.

articles.title: Yellow.ai announces availability of Yellow.ai: Enterprise-grade AI Agents for EX & CX in the new AWS Marketplace AI Agents and Tools category
articles.author: Unknown
articles.summary: Yellow.ai has made its 'Enterprise-grade AI Agents for EX & CX' available in the new AI Agents and Tools category of AWS Marketplace. Customers can now discover, buy, and deploy Yellow.ai's agentic AI platform using their AWS accounts, accelerating agent–centric and agentic workflow development.

articles.title: Cimulate's CommerceGPT Leads The Agentic AI Shopping Infrastructure Shift
articles.author: Forbes
articles.summary: Cimulate's CommerceGPT platform simulates shopping journeys. The platform powers next-generation product discovery and retail intelligence, leveraging Agentic AI.

articles.title: Amazon's No. 1 bestselling electric pressure washer is on sale for its best price ever
articles.author: Danielle Halibey
articles.summary: LWQ is offering a 50% discount on its LWQ Electric Pressure Washer, bringing the price down by $100 on Amazon for a limited time. The pressure washer features a customizable spray system with four quick-connect metal nozzles and a foam cannon attachment for applying soap. It is designed for both powerful cleaning and ease of use for homeowners.

articles.title: This Cleaning Set Handles Stains 'Like Magic' And Left Reviewers' Homes Smelling 'Like A Luxury Hotel'
articles.author: Erica Kam
articles.summary: DadMode has launched a new home and laundry cleaning set consisting of a deep stain remover, 'every surface' cleaner, instant spot cleaner, and liquid laundry detergent. The set features natural, enzyme-based formulas with a sandalwood and suede scent. The cleaners are refillable and tackle various stains, leaving homes and clothes fresh.

articles.title: JUNE becomes the official communications partner for Generatik, the platform that digitizes mall advertising
articles.author: Romania Insider
articles.summary: Brand Management launched Generatik, a digital platform for planning mall advertising campaigns, and partnered with JUNE agency for communication strategy. Generatik, launched in June 2025, streamlines the planning, estimation, and contracting of mall advertising campaigns. The launch campaign strategically positioned Generatik within the media market and increased its visibility among agencies and brands.

articles.title: Coca-Cola to Launch New Cane Sugar Soda Following Trump's HFCS Claim
articles.summary: Coca-Cola Co. will launch a new Coke product this fall. The new product is made with U.S. cane sugar.

articles.title: Latest Pokemon Legends: Z-A Trailer Reveals a Brand New Pokemon
articles.author: Ryan Woodrow
articles.summary: Nintendo's upcoming Pokémon Legends: Z-A will feature a new Mega Evolution, Mega Dragonite. Additionally, a new mobile puzzle game, Pokémon Friends, has been released.

articles.title: Tesco shoppers spot major product change instore following UK heatwave
articles.author: Manchester Evening News
articles.summary: Tesco introduced a new product change to its stores.

articles.title: How boxty became a beloved Irish dish all over the world
articles.author: Ciara O'Loughlin
articles.summary: Dromod Boxty, a traditional Irish potato pancake, was initially made and sold in a local shop in Dromod. Due to its popularity, the shop was transformed into a bakery, and eventually, Dromod Boxty became its own company. The company now sells its boxty product online and through various stockists like SuperValu, extending its reach to customers nationwide.

articles.title: Google sets August 21 for Pixel 10 launch, teases design and early offer
articles.author: Tech Desk
articles.summary: Google has announced the launch of its Pixel 10 smartphone series on August 21 during the 'Made by Google' event. The Pixel 10 Pro, featuring a triple-camera setup and a Moonstone finish, will be available for pre-order soon after the unveiling. Early subscribers to Pixel 10 updates on the Google Store will receive an exclusive offer.

articles.title: If you live in any of these locations, you can book the Tesla Model Y
articles.author: India Today
articles.summary: Tesla's Model Y is now available for booking in select locations. This indicates an expansion of the vehicle's availability to new markets.

articles.title: GALAXY Z FOLD7: 7 UNMATCHED Features No Other Foldable Has!
articles.summary: Samsung is launching the Galaxy Z Fold7, a new generation of foldable phones with unique features. The Galaxy Z Fold7 starts at Rs 174,999.

articles.title: Tech CEO Falls for AI Chatbot, Launches Startup to Deliver Private, Personalized AI Software
articles.author: ACME Brains
articles.summary: ACME Brains, Inc. launched nexie, a new personal AI software designed to enhance the usability and effectiveness of large language models for consumers. This AI application aims to provide users with personalized, private, and controlled AI experiences.

articles.title: Snow Monkey™ Partners with Born Free USA
articles.author: Snow Monkey
articles.summary: Snow Monkey ™ Sake Remix™ launched a line of sake-based ready-to-drink (RTD) beverages. The company announced a partnership with Born Free USA, supporting the Born Free USA Primate Sanctuary in south Texas.

articles.title: Folloze Announces the General Availability of Generator Agents to Deliver Highly Personalized Buyer Experiences in Real Time
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Folloze launched Folloze Generator Agents, an AI-powered B2B Buyer Experience Platform. This suite of AI-powered tools allows marketers to create, personalize, and translate on-brand microsites and content quickly.

articles.title: name.com Modernizes Domains for the Age of Agentic AI with First AI-Native Registrar Platform
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: name.com launched name.com API, an AI-native domain platform. The API transforms how companies build custom domain search, registration, and management into their services and applications. name.com API supports Model Context Protocol (MCP) and OpenAPI specification, enabling AI agents to interact directly with the API.

articles.title: Cimulate Launches CommerceGPT : The AI-Native Context Engine for a New Era of Commerce
articles.author: Cimulate
articles.summary: Cimulate introduced CommerceGPT, an AI-native platform designed for agentic commerce. This platform provides product discovery infrastructure tailored for agentic shopping experiences. CommerceGPT uses Cimulate's distillation via simulation to generate synthetic transactional information.

articles.title: Renault Sandero Leaked Ahead of Launch
articles.author: Daniel Foster
articles.summary: Dacia Sandero and Logan models will receive a new 1.0-liter turbocharged engine with options for mild-hybrid and LPG systems, plus a new six-speed dual-clutch gearbox.  A hybrid version of the Renault Sandero, potentially utilizing Renault's E-Tech technology, is highly anticipated with expected launch in late 2025 or early 2026, with speculation of a fully electric Sandero variant in the future.

articles.title: The Washroom, a Laundromat Third Space on Milwaukee's East Side
articles.author: Ben Slowey
articles.summary: The Washroom, formerly Murray Park Kwik Wash, has been rebranded and launched with new features including updated machines, a mini-library, vending machine stocked with necessities and goods from Midwest Sad, and community event hosting. The location aims to serve as a multi-purpose space for laundry, socializing, and accessing community resources.

articles.title: GuardDog AI Strengthens Executive Team with Appointment of Paul Lufkin and Bill Short as Co-Leads of CFO Role
articles.author: info@kalkinemedia.com
articles.summary: GuardDog AI launched OCI-Compliant DCX Sensor. This launch aims to revolutionize cloud-native security.

articles.title: Tacos Take Center Stage in Fuzzy's New Summer Campaign, Taco TuesYAY!
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Fuzzy's Taco Shop is launching a new Taco Tuesday value offer and new Tacos Dorado on July 24th. The company is also debuting a new top-shelf margarita.

articles.title: My Hunt for the Mini-est Skort
articles.author: Payton Turkeltaub
articles.summary: The review highlights several skorts from brands like Zara, Reformation, Free People, GUIZIO, Lululemon, Abercrombie, Urban Outfitters, Lisa Says Gah, Aritzia and Geel, evaluating their fit, fabric, and overall suitability. Geel's skort emerges as a favorite due to its luxurious fabric, perfect mid-rise fit, and versatile style.

articles.title: Tacos Take Center Stage in Fuzzy's New Summer Campaign, Taco TuesYAY!
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Fuzzy's Taco Shop launched a brand-wide Taco Tuesday offer starting July 24, 2025, which includes discounts on various tacos. The company also introduced Tacos Dorado, a new taco innovation, along with Queso Dorado. Additionally, Fuzzy's unveiled the Top-Shelf Trifecta 'Rita, a premium margarita, to its permanent menu in celebration of National Tequila Day.

articles.title: Neoclouds to Generate Over US$65 Billion in GPU-as-a-Service Revenues by 2030, ABI Research Finds
articles.author: ABI Research
articles.summary: ABI Research forecasts that neocloud providers will generate over US$65 billion in GPU-as-a-Service (GPUaaS) revenues by 2030. These neoclouds offer scalable, sovereign, and developer-centric GPU compute environments, meeting the needs of AI-driven organizations.

articles.title: Galaxy Z Fold 7: Ultra-Durable 500K Fold Display!
articles.author: Sophie Lin
articles.summary: Samsung announced the Galaxy Z Fold 7, which features a display rated for 500,000 folds, a 150% increase over previous generations, validated by Bureau Veritas after 13 days of testing at 25°C. This improvement, achieved through impact absorption enhancements and a new high-elastic adhesive, aims to provide over 10 years of use for average users.

articles.title: Coca-Cola to launch cane sugar soda in fall after Trump demand
articles.author: Ben Berkowitz
articles.summary: Coca-Cola plans to launch a new Coke product made with U.S. cane sugar this fall. This addition is designed to complement the company's strong core portfolio and offer more choices across occasions and preferences. The company did not elaborate on timing or branding for the launch.

articles.title: Rwanda: Buy, Sell and Connect With Lulu
articles.summary: Lulu.rw, a new online classifieds platform, has launched in Rwanda with the aim of becoming the country's leading portal for buying and selling goods and services. The platform offers a user-friendly interface, robust search and filter options, and a commitment to security. Currently free to use, Lulu.rw has future plans to introduce mobile applications and multi-language options.

articles.title: 45 Cool Products That Are Just Ittttching To Be In Your Cart
articles.author: Emma Lord
articles.summary: Neutrogena introduced Collagen Bank Daily Facial Moisturizer with SPF 30, offering both skin protection and skincare benefits. E.l.f. launched Hydrating Core Lip Shine in "Ecstatic", and Lash XTNDR Tubing Mascara. Olay released Super Serum Body Wash with niacinamide, shea butter, and collagen peptides. Oxo released Brew Rapid Brewer.

articles.title: Watsons Beautopia Returned This July With Over 150 Brands, Exclusive Drops & Fun Activities
articles.author: Sofia Pereira
articles.summary: JC Program launched their first ever range exclusively at Watsons Malaysia, offering AI-powered skin analysis. Adidas Fragrance was also introduced at Watsons Beautopia 2025, showcasing energetic scents for beauty consumers.

articles.title: Google's New Rival? OpenAI Claims ChatGPT Now Receives Over 2 Billion Daily Prompts From Users
articles.author: S Aadeetya
articles.summary: OpenAI's ChatGPT is experiencing a surge in user prompt requests, reaching 2.5 billion daily. The company has introduced ChatGPT agents for premium subscribers and is planning to launch GPT 5.0 in 2025, expanding its AI capabilities.

articles.title: Electrovaya Launches Multiple Battery System Products for New Robotic Vehicle Platforms with Three Leading OEMs
articles.author: Joplin Globe
articles.summary: OEM customers have launched new robotic vehicle platforms integrating multiple battery system products. These battery systems, developed by a company leveraging its battery safety and longevity technology, target the expanding robotics sector for applications like material handling and surveillance.

articles.title: Samsung Z Fold 7, Flip 7 see record Korea pre-sales
articles.author: 프리즘 기업리포트
articles.summary: Samsung Electronics reported record pre-sales of 1.04 million units for its new Galaxy Z Fold 7 and Flip 7 smartphones in South Korea from July 15th to 21st, 2025. The Galaxy AI integration and slimmer designs contributed to the high demand. The Fold 7 accounted for 60% of pre-orders, surpassing the Flip model for the first time.

articles.title: This Metallic Smart Lock Has Arrived in the US to Dethrone Other Retrofits: I Think It Has a Shot
articles.author: Tyler Lacoma
articles.summary: Nuki has launched its European smart lock in the US, offering a compact and elegant retrofit option. The $160 lock features a brushless motor, smart home integration, and time-limited access passes. Remote access requires a $6 monthly subscription.

articles.title: Next's £15 'crease-free' reversible bedding in a 'timeless classic' print
articles.author: Emily Sleight
articles.summary: Next has launched the 'Blue Gingham Reversible Duvet Cover and Pillowcase Set,' a crease-free bedding available in multiple prints and sizes, priced from £15 to £31. Dunelm also offers a similar product, the 'Hani 100% Cotton Duvet Cover and Pillowcase Set,' priced between £20-£34.

articles.title: Young Millionaires of P.E.I. take pride in building local businesses
articles.author: Judith Mendiolea
articles.summary: Several young entrepreneurs in P.E.I., participating in the Young Millionaires Program, launched their own businesses. M & L Company sells handmade crafts, Shutter Fox Creations offers photography and merchandise, and Puffy Clouds sells crocheted phone bags. Greta's Shoe Charmers sells Croc charms, bookmarks, and personalized items, and has expanded to include online sales and custom orders.

articles.title: 30 Things To Help Lazy People Clean
articles.author: Samar Hadri
articles.summary: The article highlights the introduction of various cleaning products and solutions from companies like Windex, Wet & Forget, Levoit, and Bissell. These products include solutions like outdoor glass cleaner, air purifier, carpet and upholstery cleaner, and more, designed to simplify home cleaning tasks.

articles.title: Appier Launches AdCreative.ai in Thailand to Drive Generative AI Transformation in Creative Marketing  Jul. 22, 2025 10:00
articles.summary: Appier has launched AdCreative.ai, a Generative AI-powered solution, in Thailand, designed to help brands speed up creative production, boost campaign performance, and scale personalized marketing efforts. Thai brands like Food Passion Group and Rev Edition are already using AdCreative.ai to streamline content creation and enhance creative agility.

articles.title: JD.com debuts robot food outlet in China
articles.author: Hong Kong Standard
articles.summary: JD.com launched its first self-operated food delivery outlet. This marks the company's entry into the food delivery service sector.

articles.title: Top 8 Lipsticks with SPF: Now get pout-perfect lips without sun damage; Kiss the sun goodbye
articles.author: Shweta Pandey
articles.summary: Pilgrim, Chambor, Beauty People, MyGlamm, Renee, Earth Rhythm, Plum, and SERY each offer lipsticks with SPF protection. These lipsticks come in various colors and finishes (matte, creamy, liquid), with added moisturizing ingredients, and offer long-lasting, smudge-proof wear. They are designed to protect lips from sun damage while providing vibrant color and comfortable wear.

articles.title: Chantecai's "All-Day Skincare Foundation" adds a skin care effect to its natural coverage. It applie..
articles.author: Park Yoon-Sun
articles.summary: Chantecai introduced the "All-Day Skincare Foundation" with skin care benefits, natural coverage, and calming plant ingredients. Hanskin launched the Code On Didi Cream Foundation for skin tone correction and pore coverage. Our Glasses presented the 'Vanish Air Brush Primer & Pressed Powder' for makeup, oil control, and skin texture correction. Cleddbopoe suggests the 'Collecting Cream Vale N' skin glow primer to create radiant skin.

articles.title: Vulcan Creatives opens applications for third business incubation cohort
articles.author: April Lara
articles.summary: Vulcan Creatives has launched the third cohort of the Vulcan Works business incubation programme, offering aspiring entrepreneurs mentorship, coworking spaces, and networking opportunities. The six-month programme aims to support individuals in developing business plans and refining their entrepreneurial skills.

articles.title: Next £24 diffuser makes home 'smell luxurious' and shoppers 'wish it came in a perfume'
articles.author: Emily Chaplin
articles.summary: Next's 'Moonlight Amber and Jasmine Collection Luxe New York Diffuser' is receiving positive customer feedback for its luxurious scent and elegant style. The diffuser is available on the Next website in 60ml (£9), 170ml (£24) and 400ml (£34) sizes.

articles.title: Agoda launches first-ever brand campaign in Singapore with AI-powered commercials  Jul. 22, 2025 09:05
articles.summary: Agoda launched its inaugural brand campaign in Singapore, featuring AI-powered commercials that highlight the company's flight offerings. The campaign uses generative AI technology like Google Veo, Runway, and Kling AI to showcase the value of booking flights on Agoda, with flights from Singapore starting at SGD 39. The commercials are now live on YouTube and Meta.

articles.title: Cordless vacuum with 'strong suction power' now less than £100
articles.author: Kerri-Ann Roper
articles.summary: Avalsor launched the Avalsor Cordless Vacuum Cleaner, a budget-friendly option with a 550W motor, 45,000Pa suction, and a long-lasting 8-cell battery. The vacuum is priced at £95.45 on Amazon and features an LED touchscreen and anti-tangle floor brush. It also include Gtech Airram 2 Cordless Vacuum from Gtech and Shark PowerPro Pet Cordless Stick Vacuum.

articles.title: விடா VX2 எலெக்ட்ரிக் ஸ்கூட்டரை ஏன் வாங்கலாம்.? ஏன் வாங்கக் கூடாது.? ஐந்து காரணங்கள் இதோ!
articles.summary: The article presents five reasons to consider or not consider buying the Vida VX2 electric scooter. It serves as a review or a guide for potential buyers of the new product.

articles.title: Lava Blaze Dragon 5G Price Range, Specifications and Features Leaked Ahead of Launch on July 25, 2025; Check Details Here
articles.author: Team Latestly
articles.summary: Lava is launching the Blaze Dragon 5G smartphone in India on July 25, 2025. The phone features a Snapdragon 4 Gen 2 processor, a 50MP rear camera, a 6.74-inch HD+ display with 120Hz refresh rate, and a 5,000mAh battery with 18W fast charging, and will be priced under INR 10,000.

articles.title: I think the Nissan Qashqai e-Power is the best compromise if you can't charge at home
articles.author: Rob Clymo
articles.summary: Nissan has updated the Qashqai e-Power, a hybrid SUV, with a refreshed design, reworked powertrain, and improved technology. The new version offers a quieter driving experience and enhanced fuel efficiency, aiming to provide an EV-like experience without the need for plugging in.

articles.title: Ghai's 'Saiyaara' Wisdom: Prioritize Story Over Star Power
articles.summary: A prominent technology firm has announced the deployment of a new Artificial Intelligence system to dramatically enhance user interactions across its platforms. This AI analyzes user data in real-time, allowing for dynamic adaptation of content, features, and recommendations, promising a truly personalized journey for every user.

articles.title: The £30 perfume going viral for surprising effect on your mood: 'Made me feel energised'
articles.author: LYDIA WHEATLEY
articles.summary: Moods has launched Performance MoodSwing, a dual-ended aromatherapy roller combining Fit and Genius fragrances. This product is designed to provide fast, focused energy without caffeine or sugar, boosting cognitive function, alertness, stamina, and immunity. User reviews of the individual fragrances suggest they provide increased focus, clarity, and energy.

articles.title: Nothing Phone 3 review: A different take
articles.summary: Nothing has launched the Phone 3, which features a unique design language with a transparent back panel and a round screen for displaying information. The Phone 3 is equipped with a 6.67-inch OLED display, stereo speakers, and runs on Nothing OS 3.5 based on Android 15. It has three 50-megapixel rear cameras and is powered by a 5500mAh battery.The Phone 3 costs Rs 79,999.

articles.title: This Roomba robot vac has a clever piece of tech to protect your carpets
articles.author: Connor Jewiss
articles.summary: iRobot is launching the Roomba Max 705 Combo, a robot vacuum with a PowerSpin roller mop and a mop cover that protects carpets. It features heated water for stain removal, self-washing capabilities, 175 times more suction than the 600 series, and an AutoWash Dock for self-emptying and mop maintenance. The Roomba Max 705 Combo is available for pre-order now for £1099/€1099.

articles.title: PepsiCo Launches First Ever Prebiotic Cola in Traditional Cola Category
articles.author: Brattleboro Reformer
articles.summary: Pepsi launched Pepsi Prebiotic Cola. The new cola marks the first significant innovation in the traditional cola market.

articles.title: Samsung Display's foldable OLED passes 500,000-fold test
articles.author: Korea Times
articles.summary: Samsung Display's foldable OLED panel designed for the Galaxy Z Fold 7 has successfully passed a 500,000-fold durability test, verified by Bureau Veritas. This test simulates approximately 10 years of normal usage, based on an average of 100 daily phone openings. The new panel represents an advancement in display technology for Samsung's foldable devices.

articles.title: Ricoh InnoAI Center Grand Launch Ushering in a New Era for the AI Ecosystem in Asia
articles.author: PR Newswire
org: Hong Kong Cyberport Management Company Limited
articles.summary: Ricoh Hong Kong launched the InnoAI Center, a collaborative space for AI development, along with the InnoAI Hub, a knowledge management platform. The upgraded InnoAI Linker which enables users to transfer documents and data directly from Ricoh AI MFPs to the InnoAI Hub will launch in August. The Ricoh AI Marketplace is now live, allowing InnoAI partners to connect their AI applications directly to Ricoh AI MFPs, and Ricoh InnoAI partner Pickso has launched its "Docufinder" solution on the AI Marketplace.

articles.title: OpenAI lit the spark, but real agents require more than hype
articles.author: Yoav Shoham
articles.summary: OpenAI launched Agent Mode, Google announced next-generation agent experiences, and AWS unveiled AgentCore indicating a trend towards intelligent agents. AI21 developed Maestro, an enterprise agent system, and AWS introduced AgentCore, a technical infrastructure for building custom enterprise agents. Google is also attempting to lead the way with the Agent-to-Agent protocol (A2A), a common language for agent communication.

articles.title: KIOXIA Announces Industry's First 245.76 TB NVMe SSD Built for the Demands of Generative AI Environments
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Kioxia Corporation has expanded its KIOXIA LC9 Series enterprise SSD lineup. They introduced the industry's first 245.76 terabyte NVMe SSD in 2.5-inch and EDSFF E3.L form factors. This new capacity and form factor option complements the previously announced 122.88 TB model and is purpose-built for generative AI environments.

articles.title: Move over Mario Kart World, Donkey Kong Bananza finally justifies my Nintendo Switch 2 purchase
articles.author: Games Radar
articles.summary: Nintendo launched the Nintendo Switch with The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild. The release was considered a key event, defining the Nintendo Switch as one of Nintendo's best inventions.

articles.title: Samsung offers you a huge free Galaxy upgrade but offer ends this week
articles.author: Henry Burrell
articles.summary: Samsung is set to release the Z Fold 7 and Z Flip 7, offering double storage at no extra cost during the pre-order period. The 512GB Galaxy Z Fold 7 is priced at £1,799, while the 512GB Z Flip 7 costs £1,049, with Samsung offering up to £735 off for old smartphone trade-ins and an additional £200 off for any tablet trade-in.

articles.title: BYD rolls off 13-millionth new energy vehicle, sets global benchmark
articles.author: The Himalayan Times
articles.summary: BYD celebrated the production of its 13-millionth new energy vehicle, the YANGWANG U7, at its Xiaomo Production Base. This milestone reflects BYD's strong sales growth and leading position in the global NEV market.

articles.title: Google Teases Pixel 10 Ahead of August 20 Launch, Here's What We Spotted
articles.author: Priya Pathak
articles.summary: Google has released a teaser video showcasing the upcoming Pixel 10, set to debut on August 20. The Pixel 10 features a refined design, potentially including a telephoto lens on all variants, and a new-generation Tensor chip for enhanced performance. Google focuses more on performance upgrades with new AI features.

articles.title: Google reveals Pixel 10 design and India launch date: Here is everything we know so far
articles.summary: Google will unveil the Pixel 10 series on August 20 at the 'Made by Google' event. The Pixel 10 Pro features a horizontal camera bar with three sensors and an LED flash and is shown in Moonstone color. A limited-time offer provides a discount code for pre-orders to those who subscribe to Google Store email updates by August 18.

articles.title: 「手搖冷烏冬」創意登陸香港
articles.author: V1Paper
articles.summary: Marugame Seimen has launched its "Shake Udon" series in Hong Kong, marking the first Asian region outside of Japan to offer this product. This new offering is available for takeaway at all Marugame Seimen Hong Kong stores and features a unique layered preparation in a portable cup, designed for easy enjoyment of cold udon.

articles.title: BYD's Yangwang luxury brand is going global, under consideration for Australia
articles.author: Damion Smy
articles.summary: BYD plans to launch its ultra-premium Yangwang brand, featuring the U9 electric supercar, in Europe. This launch aims to compete with established luxury brands like Porsche, Bentley, and Jaguar.

articles.title: Teen Entrepreneur Poised for $7 Million Revenue Milestone
articles.summary: Nudesox is thriving on the Shopify platform, with the founder loving each stage of its growth and seeing new opportunities arise. [Business Name], a company focused on [brieflydescribethebusiness-[brieflydescribethebusiness-replace with actual description], is on track to surpass $7 million in revenue this year through social media marketing, e-commerce integration, influencer marketing, and subscription services.

articles.title: Woman faced menopause in her 20s - what her friends did next keeps going viral
articles.author: Lauren Codling
articles.summary: Gloriah launched Soul Gel, a water-based lubricant for women experiencing menopause, in Tesco and Superdrug. The product quickly gained popularity, selling out three times and receiving positive reviews for its gentle and nourishing formula featuring ingredients like aloe vera and oat. The company initially used a creative poster campaign in the London Underground before facing a cease-and-desist order, but the product maintains a strong online reputation.

articles.title: Best Ami Colé Makeup, According to Beauty Editors
articles.author: Shelcy Joseph
articles.summary: Ami Colé, founded by Diarrha N'Diaye-Mbaye, launched as a clean beauty brand specifically catering to melanin-rich skin. The brand emphasizes diversity and aims to uplift Black beauty by offering products like foundation, concealer, and bronzer designed to enhance natural complexions.

articles.title: AI Prompting: The Hot, New Skill Where Context Is Everything
articles.author: Forbes Tech
articles.summary: A company is piloting a GenAI-based credit documentation process, aiming for a 60-65% reduction in processing time.  This new process leverages AI to extract and analyze financial history and generate draft proposals, while human employees retain decision-making control. The initiative highlights the adoption of generative AI solutions to improve efficiency in financial services.

articles.title: [브레이크뉴스] 삼성전자, ‘갤럭시 Z 폴드7·Z 플립7' 국내 사전판매 신기록 달성
articles.author: 정민우 기자
articles.summary: Samsung Electronics has achieved a new domestic pre-sale record of 1.04 million units for the 'Galaxy Z Fold7 and Z Flip7'. The 'Galaxy Z Fold7/Z Flip7' will be sequentially released worldwide starting from the 25th in Korea, the US, the UK, etc. Samsung also introduced the 'New Galaxy AI Subscription Club', a subscription program tied to the purchase of these new devices.

articles.title: Knorr partners creators to inspire new wave of joyful home cooking
articles.author: Latestnigeriannews
articles.summary: Knorr, a leading seasoning brand in Nigeria, aims to empower individuals with joy and confidence in the kitchen. The brand's mission centers around enabling everyone to find culinary success.

articles.title: GCPL targets Rs 500 crore revenue for Godrej Fab in FY26
articles.author: Bestmediainfo Bureau
articles.summary: Godrej Consumer Products (GCPL) aims to double the revenue of Godrej Fab liquid detergent to Rs 500 crore by FY26, focusing on distribution and targeted communication. The company is also expanding its pet care business with Godrej Ninja, launched in Tamil Nadu, with plans for further refinement and expansion.

articles.title: 31 Things Probably Designed By Geniuses July 2025
articles.author: Jonathan Mazzei
articles.summary: The article showcases a variety of trending products available on Amazon, ranging from household items like towel clips and self-cleaning brooms to personal care items like deodorant wipes and facial steamers. It also features innovative items such as a handheld electronics brush and a 3D-printed floating coffee sculpture available on Etsy, highlighting new and interesting products from various companies.

articles.title: Enjoy the new Pokémon present live
articles.author: Marina Collins
articles.summary: The Pokémon Company will unveil a surprise Pokémon Presents event with updates on the franchise. Anticipated announcements include news about Pokémon Champions, a new mobile and Switch game slated for 2025, potential GameCube Pokémon titles on Nintendo Switch Online, and possible evolutions to Pokémon GO with a 'Coffee Pokémon' concept.

articles.title: Platinum Karaoke unveils the Platinum Soundscape Concept Store at SM Makati to celebrate 25 years of Filipino innovation in music and entertainment
articles.author: Erika Mioten
articles.summary: Platinum Karaoke launched its first Concept Store at SM Makati Cyberzone, a pioneering retail space showcasing their karaoke systems and audio equipment. The store features advanced systems like the Alpha 2, an all-in-one entertainment hub and offers product trials in a dedicated KTV Room.

articles.title: The Gentle Habits x The Dirt Company Collab Just Makes Scents
articles.author: Simone Richardson
articles.summary: Gentle Habits and The Dirt Company have collaborated to release a limited-edition scent swap. This includes incense sticks by The Dirt Company featuring a Gentle Habits fragrance, and a washing detergent by The Dirt Company infused with Gentle Habits' cedarwood, cardamom, patchouli and white cypress scent. The products are available individually or as a bundle on both brands' websites.

articles.title: Boden knocks 50% off dress that 'felt cool on hottest day in London'
articles.author: Lea Dzifa Seeberg What's On
articles.summary: Boden's Ponte Puff Sleeve Tea Dress is now available for £65, reduced from £130 in their summer sale. Marks and Spencer offers the Floral Round Neck Midaxi Tea Dress for £39.50, and New Look features the Pink Floral Print Satin Midi Dress for £31.99.

articles.title: ‘비만치료제'가 다이어트약으로? 위고비 오남용 실태에 전문가들 경고
articles.author: Health Chosun
articles.summary: AudioNova seeks individuals to test their revolutionary hearing aid.

articles.title: Streaming ghosts: How AI bands like The Velvet Sundown are blurring the line
articles.author: Natasha Lee
articles.summary: The article discusses the emergence of AI-generated music, exemplified by "The Velvet Sundown", and the tools like Suno and Udio that enable AI music creation. Vinyl Group acquired velvetsundown.com to create a platform decoding AI-generated content and spotlighting "real" music. The success and increasing accessibility of these AI music services are impacting the music industry.

articles.title: NEOWIZ partners with Club D OA in Busan for 'The Cat and the Soup' event
articles.author: Kim Su-Jeong
articles.summary: NEOWIZ is launching a 'The Cat and the Soup' goods shop at 'Club D OA' in Busan, offering about 10 types of merchandise like stuffed animals and beach towels. 'Club D OA' will also showcase sculptural figures of cat characters for visitors to interact with, running until September 30.

articles.title: LG AI Research unveils vision to expand EXAONE AI ecosystem
articles.author: Kim Boram
articles.summary: LG AI Research has launched EXAONE 4.0, a multimodal AI model, alongside EXAONE Path 2.0, a specialized pathology model. Additionally, they introduced three new enterprise AI tools: ChatEXAONE, an employee-tailored program; EXAONE Data Foundry, a data production platform; and EXAONE On-Premise, a full-stack in-house AI solution.

articles.title: Agoda launches first-ever brand campaign in Singapore with AI-powered commercials
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: Agoda launched its first-ever brand campaign in Singapore, highlighting their flights offering with AI-powered commercials. The campaign utilizes AI video generation platforms and is live on YouTube, Meta, and TikTok, showcasing flight deals from Singapore starting at SGD 39.

articles.title: Agoda launches first-ever brand campaign in Singapore with AI-powered commercials
articles.author: info@kalkinemedia.com
articles.summary: Agoda launched its first brand campaign in Singapore. The campaign centers around AI-powered commercials.

articles.title: 31 Things So Good You'll End Up Buying Them On Repeat
articles.author: Danielle Healy
articles.summary: Several new products are introduced, including a hydrating Yerba Mate Wake Up eye gel for reducing puffiness, a scrub-free mold and mildew stain remover, and a bleach-free Wet & Forget shower cleaner for easy shower maintenance. Additionally, Essence Lash Princess mascara is highlighted, along with a snail mucin repairing essence, a Shea Butter Vanilla Cashmere body lotion, and freeze-dried Sour Skittles. Sol de Janeiro tightening cream and E.l.f.'s sheer-tint "Squeeze Me" lip balm alternative to Summer Fridays are also mentioned.

articles.title: YUAN Unveils Pandora: Ready-to-Deploy Edge AI Designed for Developers
articles.author: YUAN High-Tech
articles.summary: YUAN High-Tech has launched Pandora, an ultra-compact edge AI platform powered by NVIDIA Jetson Orin NX Super mode. This platform, already implemented across sectors such as education, smart retail, and robotics, offers real-time analytics and localized AI-driven services, operating independently of cloud infrastructure. Pandora delivers 157 TOPS of AI performance, supports mainstream AI models and YUAN's proprietary modules further support real-time object, face, and behavior recognition.

articles.title: How to Watch the July 2025 Pokemon Presents (And 3 Things That Need to Be There)
articles.author: Comic Book
articles.summary: The Pokemon Company is anticipated to announce new mechanics, card lists, and potentially older Pokemon titles for the Nintendo Switch 2 during the upcoming Pokemon Presents. This includes possible updates to battle requirements, dual-type decks, and the introduction of classic battle options.

articles.title: Teen Entrepreneur's Side Hustle Poised to Generate Seven-Figure Revenue
articles.author: Internewscast
articles.summary: Leila Quraishi's sock brand, Nudesox, is scaling up with plans to launch new styles and expand distribution channels. Nudesox has also partnered with QVC, selling over 500 pairs of socks per minute during their first show. The company is projected to sell over 30,000 pairs of socks this year.

articles.title: 8 best shop vacs for heavy-duty messes
articles.author: The Curator Team
articles.summary: DEWALT introduces a 9-Gallon Poly Wet/Dry Vac with a built-in blower. Shop-Vac presents a 5-Gallon Stainless Steel Wet/Dry Vacuum for everyday use, while RIDGID offers a 12-Gallon NXT Wet/Dry Vac with a powerful motor. CRAFTSMAN launches a portable 2.5-Gallon Wet/Dry Vac. Armor All offers Wet/Dry Utility Shop Vacuum for vehicle detailing, BISSELL offers Garage Pro Wall-Mounted Wet/Dry Vac. Stanley introduces a 10-Gallon Wet/Dry Vac, and Vacmaster introduces Beast Series 16-Gallon Wet/Dry Vac. Kobalt launches XTR 24-Volt Max 1/2-in Brushless Cordless Drill and Milwaukee offers PACKOUT Rolling Tool Box.

articles.title: New Balance Gets 'Dirty' on Pre-Distressed 1000
articles.summary: New Balance will launch the New Balance 1000 'Dirty' on August 1, 2025. The sneaker features a silver metallic colorway, a retro runner design drawing from the original 1999 model, and a pre-distressed aesthetic with dirt-like smears and abrasions throughout.

articles.title: 32 Cheap Products That Belong In A Hall Of Fame
articles.author: Danielle Healy
articles.summary: E.l.f. is launching its new sheer tint "Squeeze Me" lip balm, which contains moisturizing hyaluronic acid. It's marketed as an affordable alternative to the Summer Fridays Lip Butter Balm.

articles.title: AI Prompting: The Hot, New Skill Where Context Is Everything
articles.author: Judith Magyar
articles.summary: Landesbank Baden-Württemberg (LBBW) is piloting a GenAI-based credit documentation process. This new service aims to achieve a 60% to 65% reduction in the time required for corporate clients to complete a credit application, leveraging AI for heavy lifting tasks such as data extraction and analysis to generate draft proposals.

articles.title: Ice-making water purifiers see surge in sales
articles.author: WANG KEJU
articles.summary: Haier, Midea, Xiaomi, and Philips are competing in the ice-making water purifier market in China. Sales of these multifunctional water purifiers grew 260 percent year-on-year according to e-commerce platform JD, driven by young consumers seeking convenience and personalized experiences, and supported by the national trade-in program that includes water purifiers.

articles.title: These Cleaning Tools Available at Amazon Make Chores Less of a Hassle
articles.author: Maggie Horton
articles.summary: The article highlights several new cleaning gadgets and tools available at Amazon. Bissell CrossWave OmniForce Cordless Wet-Dry Vacuum allows users to vacuum and mop simultaneously, and the Shark StainStriker Portable Carpet and Upholstery Cleaner removes years-old stains from upholstery without much scrubbing.

articles.title: Samsung Display's new foldable OLED panel passes 500,000-fold durability test
articles.author: Yonhap News
articles.summary: Samsung Display Co. introduced its latest foldable product.

articles.title: Electrovaya Launches Multiple Battery System Products for New Robotic Vehicle Platforms with Three Leading OEMs
articles.author: Waco Tribune-Herald
articles.summary: Three OEM customers are receiving multiple battery system products. These products are designed for new robotic vehicle platforms. Applications include material handling and surveillance systems.

articles.title: How to get Honedge and evolutions Doublade and Aegislash in Pok�mon Go
articles.author: Eurogamer
articles.summary: Niantic introduced Honedge, Doublade, and Aegislash into the Pokémon Go game. These characters are evolutions within the Pokemon universe and represent new content within the existing gaming service.

articles.title: Help us, Lenovo, you're our only hope – Legion Go 2's prototype and OLED screen ...
articles.author: Tech Radar
articles.summary: Lenovo's prototype handheld gaming device, the Lenovo Legion Go 2, is reportedly available for sale in China via second-hand platforms. The device is still in its prototype phase.

articles.title: Disney and Netflix are quietly using the same generative AI startup – here's why the ...
articles.author: Tech Radar
articles.summary: Disney is experimenting with Runway AI's tools. Runway AI provides a service to companies like Disney.

articles.title: Google Confirms Pixel 10 In Surprise Reveal
articles.author: Forbes
articles.summary: Google confirmed the Pixel 10 through the Google Store. This action preemptively addresses upcoming discussions and leaks surrounding the device.

articles.title: TRYSCENT Announces Major Brand Development in Luxury Fragrance Industry
articles.author: Get News
articles.summary: TRYSCENT introduces a new brand initiative focused on democratizing luxury in the fragrance market. This initiative reflects the company's focus on innovation and adapting to evolving market needs, aiming to strengthen its market position.

articles.title: Tesla Diner's Full Menu and Prices Revealed
articles.author: The Capital Journal
articles.summary: Tesla has launched a new diner, offering a menu of items available for order.

articles.title: Coke Caves to Trump
articles.author: Political Wire
articles.summary: Coca-Cola Co. plans to launch a new Coke product this fall. The new product will be made with U.S. cane sugar.

articles.title: blank street Archives
articles.summary: Blank Street is opening its first New Jersey location in Jersey City. This represents the introduction of their existing service to a new geographical market.
